```{r _shedule, echo=FALSE}
library(yaml)
conf <- yaml.load_file("_meta/schedule.yml")
course <- conf[["current"]]
course_name <- conf[[course]][["title"]] 
start_data <- conf[[course]][["start"]] 
end_data <- conf[[course]][["end"]] 
exam_date <- conf[[course]][["exam"]][["date"]] 
slots <- conf[[course]][["slots"]] 
```

## `r course_name` | `r start_data` - `r end_data`

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
for (slot in slots) {

  cat('#### [', slot[["title"]] ,':',slot[["subtitle"]],'](',slot[["doc"]],') | ',slot[["date"]],
      '[ [exercises](',slot[["exercises"]],') ]' ,' ',
      '[ [solutions](',slot[["solutions"]],') ]' ,
      '\n')
  cat('\n')
}
```
